mapper.insert: insert into second_requirement (second_requirement_id, first_requirement_id, `sequence`, description) values (#{secondRequirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstRequirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select second_requirement_id, first_requirement_id, `sequence`, description from second_requirement
